challenges.title: Pentester Notebook
challenges.description: Delve into a security researcher's notebook holding pentesting exploits and hidden secrets. Navigate through encryption layers and security defenses to uncover the flag.
challenges.author: 0xizen

challenges.title: Free-TRIP
challenges.description: Challenge involving a travel discount system. Use the coupon code TRIP18 to begin your journey.
challenges.author: 0xizen

challenges.title: Agent-Mission
challenges.description: Become the NFSU agent they're looking for. Infiltrate the endpoint and claim the hidden flag.
challenges.author: 0xizen

challenges.title: Method Madness
challenges.description: Challenge focusing on HTTP method manipulation. Think outside the POST office!
challenges.author: 0xiZen

challenges.title: SQL Sleight
challenges.description: SQL injection challenge requiring careful query manipulation to fetch the flag without detection.
challenges.author: 0xiZen

challenges.title: WebSocket Secrets
challenges.description: Interact with an admin bot through WebSocket chat to uncover hidden secrets. No automated scanning allowed.
challenges.author: 0xiZen
